name: Aceternity UI
description: A layout effect that animates the grid item on click, powered by framer motion layout

props.Description: An array of Card objects. Each Card object should have the following properties: id (a unique identifier), content (the JSX.Element to be displayed), className (the CSS class name for the card), and thumbnail (the URL of the thumbnail image).

usage_notes: A layout effect that animates the grid item on click, powered by framer motion layout
imports: import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react";
